definition: to leave/to depart/to separate/to distinguish/to classify/other/another/don't ...!/to pin/to stick (sth) in

sentences.english: He always optimistic and genially treats the others.
sentences.chinese: 他總是樂觀的，並且和善地對待別人。

sentences.english: For now, let others help you be successful.
sentences.chinese: 但是目前，讓別人幫助你成功吧。

sentences.english: It will not mean things like levitating objects and reading others minds.
sentences.chinese: 它不會是把物體升空和看穿別人的心思之類的事。

sentences.english: Don't say that there is no true love, don't let others mistook you seen it all.
sentences.chinese: 別說這世間沒有真愛，不要讓別人誤以爲你閱人無數。

sentences.english: Apologies should not be about permission to us to forgive someone.
sentences.chinese: 道歉不應該成爲我們寬恕別人的許可證。

sentences.english: Before you can minister to anyone, you must first be able to minister to your heavenly Father.
sentences.chinese: 你必須先服事你在天上的父，才能去服事別人。

sentences.english: Boxing is about respect - getting it for yourself and taking it away from the other guy.
sentences.chinese: 拳擊是關於尊嚴，贏得你自己的，同時也剝奪別人的。

sentences.english: But many do mislead (men) by their appetites unchecked by knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 有許多人，必因自己的私慾，而無知地使別人迷誤。

sentences.english: Avoid using the word to speak against yourself or to gossip about others.
sentences.chinese: 避免說反話或別人的八卦。

sentences.english: “You don’t have to drop them off, ” Madeleine said, undeterred.
sentences.chinese: “你不用交給別人去洗，”瑪德琳毫不退縮地說。

sentences.english: And most brain-numbing of all, you have expectations about what other people expect of you.
sentences.chinese: 當腦子都麻木了，想想別人對你的預期。

sentences.english: He always borrows money from others but the repayment is on the Greek calends .
sentences.chinese: 當心那傢伙，他總是找別人借錢，但是從不還錢。

sentences.english: To ask others about their ages is not polite.
sentences.chinese: 問別人的年齡是不文雅的。

sentences.english: So then, let us not be like others, who are asleep, but let us be alert and self-controlled.
sentences.chinese: 所以我們不要睡覺，像別人一樣，總要儆醒謹守。

sentences.english: I figured instead of killing other people, I’d just put the truck in the ditch.
sentences.chinese: 我在想的是爲了避免別人送命，我得將卡車開向路堤。

definition: counterpart/other person involved/opposite side/other side/receiving party
this/this kind of/this sort of/this type of
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
improbable/unlikely/will not (act, happen etc)/not able/not having learned to do sth/(coll.) (Tw) don't mention it/not at all
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
to feel/to become aware of/feeling/sense/perception/CL:個|个[ge4]
